ans:
We are using state bulletins and official handles to update our numbers. The data is validated by a group of volunteers and published into a Google sheet and an API.
https://telegra.ph/Covid-19-Sources-03-19

que: Where is the patients data maintained?
ans:
A patients data is being maintained by Crowdsourced Patient Database in Google sheet.
https://bit.ly/patientdb

que: Why this application's count is ahead of MoHFW?
ans: MoHFW releases the count at a scheduled time. However, we update them based on state press bulletins, official handles and reliable news channels which could be more recent.
